Module kivakit.network.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.network.core

Class Port

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.network.core.Port
public class Port extends Object
A host, port and protocol. The port has a number, accessible with number(), it exists on a Host and it speaks a given protocol().
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)

    • from

      public static Port from​(URI uri)
      Returns:
      A port object from the given URI

    • parsePort

      public static Port parsePort​(Listener listener, String port)
      Parses a port of the form "[host]:[port-number]". If the port number is omitted, port 80 is assumed.
      Returns:
      A port for the given string or null if the string is not a port
